Title: Doc Hollywood
Writer: Neil B. Shulman (book), Laurian Leggett (adaptation), Jeffrey Price (screenplay), Peter S. Seaman (screenplay), Daniel Pyne (screenplay)
Actors: Michael J. Fox, Julie Warner, Barnard Hughes, Woody Harrelson
Plot: A young doctor on his way across the country to a job interview crashes his car in a small town and is sentenced to work for several days at the town hospital.
